page.title: 11A MILLIONAIRE'S LIFE STYLE
page.content: Mr Abad is an Egyptian millionaire. He owns Pegglesworth farm which is 800 acres. He has two swimming pools, one for himself and one for his horses to exercise them. He has a polo ground and two days before we visited his farm he had had the king of Jordan's brother come to play polo with ten body guards. Mr Abad is only at the farm for two or three months of the year and someone else is paid by him to manage the farm for him. The manager's name is Mr A'Barr. The manager lives on the farm and has two children. Mr Abad's house is very nice and he has a silk bedroom where every bit of material is silk. The manager employs only three people for the farm, two men and one woman but ten grooms are employed to look after the 44 horses.
